Title: Suspends certain provisions relating to petitions for incorporation of a village
Summary: Suspends certain provisions relating to petitions for incorporation of a village until July 1, 2021 for any town upon the affirmative vote of a majority of such town's board; directs the department of state to conduct a study on the existing laws and regulations regarding the incorporation, merger, and dissolution of municipalities for the purpose of making recommendations of amendments to such laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to incorporation of villages; relating to directing a municipal re-organization study; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
